p: The quality of a phosphor powder is related not only to its chemical and phase purity but also to the particle size and morphology [ 38]. Figure 4a,b are the FESEM morphologies of BiOCl and Bi 0.9925OCl:0.0075Pr 3+ samples, respectively. It can be seen that all these particles were in irregular oblate spheres. The particle size was uniform and about 1–3 μm. The average particle size was close to the optimal shape and size, which also had a positive impact on the luminescence performance.
